title: If it could be about anything, what would be the title of the book (non-existant) that you most would love to read? - Quora

response.answer_text: To plug my favorite writer, he has a story featuring a shop of such a books.  Now, I, I would like to read an 11th book of Amber. It can be The King of Chaos, or The Gost of Lorgus, or The Ghost of Pattern, or The King of Kashfa, or The Keep of Four Worlds, or The Lawyer of Amber, or The Second Pattern… I am not picky.

Culture #11 - The Waste Land by Iain M Banks.After unintentionally unleashing a deadly foe in a botched contact mission. SC must enlist Cheradenine Zakalwe to discover the secret of the creation of the species called the Changers.
